segments.text: Good morning . I need to speak with the property manager , please .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good morning . You are speaking to the property manager .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: While it was raining last night , water started leaking in from the ceiling .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Was it leaking in the bedroom ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It was in the living room .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can you tell me which floor you are on ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We are on the bottom floor .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I would like to look at the leak . Will you be home this morning ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , someone will be here to let you in .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Just in case you have to leave , we will just use the master key .
segments.speaker: S2
